articles.description: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate’s closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‘are securities’.

articles.description: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‘Chokepoint 2.0’ grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!

articles.description: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‘no crypto companies’. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!

articles.description: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‘alt season’. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‘done months ago’. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users’ data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won’t serve time in jail.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!

articles.description: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO

articles.description: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin’s now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT

articles.description: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‘out of thin air’. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.

articles.description: Bitcoin dominance rises ahead of Fed. May see short-term crash after Fed: Hayes. ETH underperformance may reverse soon: BitWise. Vitalik sings during Token 2049 appearance. SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.

articles.description: Dustin Stockton is known as the “Godfather of Political Finance” but he wasn’t always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.
articles.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin

Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
Former president and Republican candidate Donald Trump’s decentralized finance (DeFi) and crypto initiative, World Liberty Financial, has officially begun signing up users, although details of the platform’s specific services remain vague. 
 
Announced on social media platforms X (formerly Twitter) and Telegram on Monday, the project is currently accepting accredited US investors as well as non-US participants.
 
Trump’s Vision For Crypto
 
The project’s announcement emphasized its commitment to inclusivity, stating, “The World Liberty Financial whitelists are now OPEN. Backed by Donald J. Trump. While these whitelists are currently open to accredited investors in the US and all non-US persons, we are not turning our backs on the everyday American.” 
 
This reflects the initiative’s goal o…
articles.title: Trump’s Latest Insights On Crypto: Key Updates On His DeFi Project And More

articles.author: Keshav Verma
articles.description:
On-chain data shows the Bitcoin Mining Hashrate has remained at its recent lows, indicating that miners may not be confident about the coin’s rally.
 
Bitcoin Mining Hashrate Has Moved Sideways Around Lows Recently
 
The “Mining Hashrate” refers to a metric that keeps track of the total computing power miners have currently attached to the Bitcoin network. Its value is traditionally measured in hashes per second (H/s), but these days, larger units like terahashes per second (TH/s) are used instead, as they’re more practical.
 
 
When the value of this metric goes up, it means new miners are joining the network, and old ones are expanding their facilities. Such a trend implies that these chain validators are now finding blockchain attractive.
 
On the other hand, the indicator registering a…
articles.title: Bitcoin Hashrate Continues To Be At Lows: Miners Not Confident About Rally?

articles.author: Damian Chmiel
articles.description:
Robinhood  
Markets announced today (Tuesday) the launch of cryptocurrency transfers for  
its European customers, marking an important expansion of its services in the  
region.
The new  
feature enables users to deposit and withdraw two dozen digital assets,  
including major tokens such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), and  
USD Coin (USDC).
Robinhood Crypto Launches  
Cryptocurrency Transfers for European Customers
The move  
comes in response to high demand from European traders and aims to provide  
greater flexibility and control over digital assets. To promote the new  
offering, Robinhood Crypto prepared a limited-time offer of a 1% match on all  
crypto deposits, paid out in the same cryptocurrency deposited.
“With the  
launch of crypto transfers in Europe, we’re …
articles.title: Robinhood Introduces Crypto Transfers for EU Customers, Eyes Market Share

articles.description: The yen losses suggest the market is not worried about Ishiba's hawkish image and potential for faster BOJ rate hikes. BTC's drop likely stemmed from other factors.

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: Japan is reportedly set to review its cryptocurrency regulations, potentially reducing taxes on digital assets. The Financial Services Agency (FSA) plans to assess whether current crypto regulations under the payments act provide sufficient investor protection. The review may lead to reclassifying crypto as financial instruments under Japan’s investment law, which could enhance safeguards and bring […]
articles.title: Japan to Review Crypto Regulations, Potentially Easing Tax Burden

articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
Following the recent price upswing in the price of Bitcoin, several factors like crowd sentiment have been considered to be the major reason for the surge. However, Axel Adler Jr a market expert has delved into the subject, noting that the recent and previous price spike is majorly attributed to supply and demand.
 
Supply And Demand Dynamics Control Bitcoin’s Market
 
According to Santiment, a leading market intelligence platform, the positive sentiment around Bitcoin is witnessing a significant uptick reaching a new high point of the year, with investors and traders anticipating the digital asset to reach the $70,000 price level soon.
 
 
This increase in positive sentiment comes after BTC experienced an over 22% rise in the last 3 weeks. As a result, crypto enthusiasts and investors are…
articles.title: Bitcoin’s Price Movement Primarily Influenced By Supply And Demand, Expert Claims

articles.title: China’s Former Vice Minister of Finance Calls for Research on Crypto as US Policy Pivots
